ComicInfo.Summary:
I'll Bug You to Your Grave: Casey's electric eavesdropping equipment picks up the ghost of the man he killed.
Half a Man Is Better Than None! (But Don't You Believe It!): Sir Byron McCabe, on the run from the law, makes a deal with the beings of an unseen invisible world.
When Is It My Time to Die?: Someone is killing citizens and the suspicions all lead to Mr. Erghon, a purveyor of hexes.
Steps to Disaster!: A criminal steals a pair of wooden shoes.
The Corpse That Didn't Die: When a mugger steals his wallet and then dies, Cyrus Marshall is allowed to attend his own funeral to see how he'll be remembered.
The Vengeful Windmill!: A man is killed by a windmill.
Friday the 13th Club: Thirteen men and women form a club to debunk superstition, but one by one they meet violent deaths. They don’t die, however, because they challenge fate, but because they touched a poisoned gavel to smash a mirror with.
That Dead Old Gang of Mine: Jeff misses all his old poker buddies.
I Fell in Love with a Witch!: Private investigator Carter Blake falls head over heels in love with Jean Brewster. Without knowing anything about her, he's willing to marry her. Checking old newspaper clippings, Blake finds out that his fiancée seems to possess witch-like powers. Three of her former husbands died after her "kiss of death."
Free Me from the Bewitched Bell!: A treasure-hunting adventurer is trapped by the vibrations of a giant bell.
Master of the Voodoo Machine!: Inventor Jon Garson's duplicator machine has an unexpected voodoo effect which Garson attempts to capitalize on by killing a romantic rival, but retribution still makes him pay for his crime.
The Man Who Betrayed Earth: A film director turns out to be the one man who can stop an alien invasion.
